text: My good Dad () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Igor Usov.«Влип, очкарик»! Пять ярких ролей Александра ДемьяненкоМОЙ ДОБРЫЙ ПАПА It stars Aliagha Aghayev, Sasha Arutyunov, and Eldar Azimov. == Actors == * Aliagha Aghayev * Sasha Arutyunov as Boba * Eldar Azimov * Rafiq Azimov * Nikolay Boyarskiy as Uncle Gosha * Masha Bryanskaya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: My good Dad
